data.text: @colbyjohanson Hi! Your email will be timestamped to show that you requested the rebook within the 72 hour window. The team will see this when they reach out to you and will honour the timestamp.

data.text: @cglubish You’re welcome! It should just walk you through and you should get the option to cancel a “leg” or “flight”. I’m not 100% on the terminology used. The option is definitely there though. If you have any issues I would suggest sending a DM or calling support on Monday.
@cglubish Hi there! You can definitely cancel and receive future travel credit if it is due to public health measures in response to the pandemic. You would still use the same self serve portal.

Canada's wine country is back! Service to Kelowna has resumed with flights on Monday & Friday, and is available through the holiday season. If you are in the market for a solo trip, let us take you to #YLW for less. 💚

📸: okgnsunshinetax on Instagram https://t.co/0VaeZJfrey

data.text: @7Cbreezy7 Hi there. We apologize about this, we did have to cancel some flights due to decreased demand with the pandemic. Cancelled flights have been refunded to the card that was used during booking. If you have questions, please reach out to customer support.

I miss my family, but the only thing on my wishlist this year is for them to stay safe. I hope you all are as well! 💚

data.text:
Looking for a pow day? ⛷️🏂

Use the code "GrouseMtn" when booking with Vancouver Hotels to get a free lift ticket, with a one night stay before March 31, 2021. Follow the link below! 

(p.s you get more lift tickets the longer you stay!) 🤫

https://t.co/EbJsY9DstF https://t.co/Tlj6gxt0Qm
